summary: Cecil Fielder  was a Major League Baseball player for 14 years, mainly with the Detroit Tigers.
full_text: Cecil Grant Fielder  is a former professional baseball player who was a noted power hitter in the 1980s and 1990s. He attended college at the University of Nevada, Las Vegas . He played with the Toronto Blue Jays , Hanshin Tigers , Detroit Tigers , New York Yankees , Anaheim Angels and Cleveland Indians . In 1990, he became the first player to reach the 50-home run mark since George Foster hit 52 for the Cincinnati Reds in 1977. He is the father of Texas Rangers first baseman Prince Fielder, who has similarly established himself as a premier power hitter over the past decade.
title: Cecil Fielder
